name: Add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from a new Transistor.fm subscriber
description:
Every time a new subscriber is added in Transistor.fm, a new row containing subscriber details will be added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ko5zd8rThuDXh4Y_wHvG3Xl_T2eml5qcBARF0qZ3FcY/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as a destination for the Transistor.fm subscribers. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.
